Athletics.description: Climb, jump, swim, shove, grapple — all strength-based movement

Stealth.description: Sneaking, hiding, moving silently, disabling devices

Perception.description: Notice hidden objects, listen for danger, detect movement

Insight.description: Read emotions, detect lies, sense hidden motives

Survival.description: Tracking, foraging, handling animals, wilderness navigation

Social.description: Persuade, deceive, intimidate, perform — all verbal influence

Craft.description: Create, repair, or modify items: alchemy, traps, smithing

Divine.description: Spellcasting from divine sources; faith, blessings, rites

Nature.description: Druidic magic, weather, terrain, animals, herbalism

Occult.description: Curses, spirits, pacts, blood rituals, forbidden knowledge
